pages.text: Cardigan Corgis are small, hearty dogs originally bred for chasing off predators and rival herds from a grazing area for their master's cattle herd.$(br2)At only around half a black tall, these dogs come in four different coats and can make great companions!
Cardigan Corgis can be found most commonly in various taiga biomes. They may also be found in normal forests, and more rarely in dark oak forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
